record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Connect command panel" and format.name="connect" and syslanguage="en"
record.format.name: connect

brief.brief: The Connect command panel begins a communication session with an external configuration item (such as a printer), file, or program.

detail.detail: File: (connection variable) Specify the connection variable assigned to the communication session.
Configuration Item Address: (character) Specify the configuration item address for the configuration item, file, or program (VTAM node name or dataset name).
Type: (character) Specify the session type (vtam, qsam, popen, jes).
Options: (array of characters) Specify the labels of panels to go to if errors occur.
The connection type determines the available options and exits.
While a connection is in place, all error exits should lead to a disconnections.
